tool.name: Compare
tool.description: InStrain is a tool for analysis of co-occurring genome populations from metagenomes, Compare: compares multiple inStrain profiles (popANI, coverage_overlap, etc.)
tool.command: #if $stb cp '$stb' 'stb_file.stb' && #end if #if $other.genome cp '$other.genome' 'genome_file.stb' && #end if #for $i, $s in enumerate($input) mkdir -p $i-input.IS/output && mkdir -p $i-input.IS/raw_data && cp '${s.scaffold_info}' '$i-input.IS/output/' && cp '${s.mapping_info}' '$i-input.IS/output/' && cp '${s.SNVs}' '$i-input.IS/output/' && #if $s.gene_info cp '${s.gene_info}' '$i-input.IS/output/' && #end if #if $s.genome_info cp '${s.genome_info}' '$i-input.IS/output/' && #end if cp '${s.linkage}' '$i-input.IS/output/' && #if $s.covT cp '${s.covT}' '$i-input.IS/raw_data/covT.hd5' && #end if #if $s.clonT cp '${s.clonT}' '$i-input.IS/raw_data/clonT.hd5' && #end if #if $s.clonTR cp '${s.clonTR}' '$i-input.IS/raw_data/clonTR.hd5' && #end if #if $s.scaffold_2_mm_2_read_2_snvs cp '${s.scaffold_2_mm_2_read_2_snvs.pickle}' '$i-input.IS/raw_data/scaffold_2_mm_2_read_2_snvs.pickle' && #end if #if $s.attributes cp '${s.attributes}' '$i-input.IS/raw_data/' && #end if #if $s.bin2length cp '${s.bin2length}' '$i-input.IS/raw_data/' && #end if #if $s.cumulative_scaffold_table cp '${s.cumulative_scaffold_table}' '$i-input.IS/raw_data/' && #end if #if $s.cumulative_snv_table cp '${s.cumulative_snv_table}' '$i-input.IS/raw_data/' && #end if #if $s.raw_linkage_table cp '${s.raw_linkage_table}' '$i-input.IS/raw_data/' && #end if #if $s.raw_snp_table cp '${s.raw_snp_table}' '$i-input.IS/raw_data/' && #end if #if $s.README cp '${s.README}' '$i-input.IS/raw_data/' && #end if #if $s.read_report cp '${s.read_report}' '$i-input.IS/raw_data/' && #end if #if $.scaffold2bin cp '${s.scaffold2bin}' '$i-input.IS/raw_data/' && #end if #if $.scaffold2length cp '${s.scaffold2length}' '$i-input.IS/raw_data/' && #end if #if $.scaffold_list cp '${s.scaffold_list}' '$i-input.IS/raw_data/' && #end if #if $.window_table cp '${s.window_table}' '$i-input.IS/raw_data/' && #end if #end for inStrain compare #if $input --input '0-input.IS' '1-input.IS' #end if --output 'output.IS.COMPARE' --processes "\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-6}" #if $stb --stb 'stb_file.stb' #end if --min_cov $variant_calling.min_cov --min_freq $variant_calling.min_freq --fdr $variant_calling.fdr $database.database_mode --breadth $database.breadth #if $other.scaffolds --scaffolds '$other.scaffolds' #end if #if $other.genome --genome 'genome_file.stb' #end if $other.store_coverage_overlap $other.store_mismatch_locations $other.include_self_comparisons $other.skip_plot_generation --group_length $other.group_length --ani_threshold $genome_clustering.ani_threshold --coverage_treshold $genome_clustering.coverage_treshold --clusterAlg '$genome_clustering.clusterAlg' && ls 0-input.IS/output/

param.name: scaffold_info
param.label: Scaffold Info
param.help: The basic information about the scaffolds in your sample at the highest allowed level of read identity.

param.name: mapping_info
param.label: Mapping Info
param.help: Provides an overview of the number of reads that map to each scaffold, and some basic metrics about their quality.

param.name: SNVs
param.label: SNVs
param.help: Describes the SNVs and SNSs that are detected in this mapping.

param.name: gene_info
param.label: Gene Info
param.help: Describes some basic information about the genes being profiled

param.name: genome_info
param.label: Genome Info
param.help: Describes many of the above metrics on a genome-by-genome level, rather than a scaffold-by-scaffold level.

param.name: linkage
param.label: Linkage
param.help: Describes the linkage between pairs of SNPs in the mapping that are found on the same read pair at least min_snp times.

param.name: genome_info
param.label: Genome Info
param.help: Describes many of the above metrics on a genome-by-genome level, rather than a scaffold-by-scaffold level.

param.label: Scaffold to bin
param.help: This can be a file with each line listing a scaffold and a bin name, tab-seperated. This can also be a space-seperated list of .fasta files, with one genome per .fasta file. If nothing is provided, all scaffolds will be treated as belonging to the same genome

param.label: Minimum coverage to call an variant
Minimum SNP frequency to confirm a SNV
param.help: Both this AND the FDR snp count cutoff must be true to call a SNP.
SNP false discovery rate- based on simulation data with a 0.1 percent error rate (Q30)

param.label: Automatically determine which genomes are present in each Profile and only compare scaffolds from those genomes.
param.help: All profiles must have run Profile with the same .stb

param.label: Minimum breadth_minCov required to count a genome present
Location to a list of scaffolds to compare. You can also make this a .fasta file and it will load the scaffold names
Run scaffolds belonging to this single genome only. Must provide an .stb file
Store coverage overlap on an mm level
Store the locations of SNPs
Compare IS profiles against themself
Dont create plots at the end of the run
How many bp to compare simultaneously
param.help: higher will use more RAM and run more quickly

param.label: popANI threshold to cluster genomes at
param.help: Must provide .stb file to do so

param.label: Minimum percent_genome_compared for a genome comparison to count
param.help: if below the popANI will be set to 0

param.label: Algorithm used to cluster genomes

data.name: comparisonsTable
data.label: Summarizes the differences between two inStrain profiles on a scaffold by scaffold level

data.name: pairwise_SNP_locations
data.label: Lists the locations of all differences between profiles.

data.name: genomeWide_compare
data.label: A genome-level summary of the differences detected by inStrain compare.
